resources.string: TextTune was created by TimmyGCentral. Follow us on Twitter: @timmygcentral

How can I add a song to a YouTube playlist?

You can either add it manually via the add song button or a song can be texted to your phone with the proper tag (default is #song then song).
 
 What is the proper format for a texted song?

If your tag is "play", a "#play beatles" text will add Yesterday by The Beatles to your YouTube playlist.
 
 Why does it keep creating new playlists?

This is determined by the Default Playlist Interval defined in the settings. If you set it to Never, playlists will only be created manually (via add playlist button).
 
 How is the specific video chosen?

The top result from the keywords via a YouTube search.
 
 Why do I keep getting live versions of songs? I want the album/studio version.

Try adding "studio version" or "album version" at the end of the keywords, for instance "beatles yesterday album".
 
 For more help, visit here.
Amount of time between new songs added to playlist that TextTune will automatically create a new playlist
